translations: 自然的；无限制的；放纵的

sentences.sentence: There was unrestrained joy on the faces of the people.
sentences.translation: 人们的脸上有无拘无束的快乐。

sentences.sentence: That would be true only if you believed that patients should have an unrestrained right to treatments proven to be inferior.
sentences.translation: 只有当你认为患者有权不受限制地享有已证劣等治疗时，这才是正确的。

sentences.sentence: Initially unrestrained by predators of their own, foreign predators are likely to be able to multiply rapidly and overwhelm intended targets.
sentences.translation: 外来掠食者最初不受自身掠食者的限制，它们可能会迅速繁殖并击溃预定目标。
